data.title: 2024 WayV CONCERT [ON THE Way] IN MACAU
data.description:
Date & Time 時間: 2025/02/15 (SAT) 7:30PM

Venue 地點: 澳門新濠影滙綜藝館 MACAU STUDIO CITY EVENT CENTER


WayZenNi WEVERSE Pre-sale WayZenNi WEVERSE會員優先訂票

2024/11/22 (FRI) 10:00 – 20:00 Local time


General Sale 公開售票

2024/11/23 (SAT) 12:00 Noon Local time



Ticket Price 門票價格 （未包含服務費）

-VIP SEATED|SOUND CHECK MOP$1888

*VIP TICKET *1 / 一張VIP門票

*SOUND CHECK EXPERIENCE / SOUND CHECK PARTY體驗

*SOUND CHECK PASS + LANYARD / 彩排證+掛繩

-PLATINUM MOP$1888

-GOLD RV MOP$1888

※PLATINUM & GOLD RV MOP$1888隨機電腦抽取30名幸運粉絲獲得限量簽名海報(不包括彩排套組購買客戶) Random Lucky draw of 30 signed poster winners of MOP$1888 purchase (Excluding VIP SEATED|SOUND CHECK purchase)

-A MOP$1488 ※隨機電腦抽取10名幸運粉絲獲得限量簽名拍立得Random Lucky draw of 10 signed polaroid winners

-B MOP$888



*Each ticket is assigned a specific seat.

所有票價均為坐席(對號入座)。

*Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase.

無論是會員預售還是公開發售，都請記得預先登記成為各票務網站會員才可購票

*Registration does not guarantee you a ticket. Your WayZenNi WEVERSE number will be your presale promo code

登記會員並不保證成功購票。您的WayZenNi WEVERSE會員編號即為您的預購碼(例: WW123456789)

*Purchase limit is 1 ticket for WayZenNi WEVERSE pre-sale and 4 tickets per show (including the 1 ticket purchased during the pre-sale) per transaction for general sale. If more than 1 ticket are purchased with the same membership ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

會員預購每筆ID限購一張票券，公開售票每人每交易限購四張票券(含一張會員預購票券)。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超過一張，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易

*One person per ticket regardless of age. A valid ticket is required for admission

每張門票只供一人進場。入場時必需持有有效門票。

*If a ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep your ticket carefully.

演出門票如有遺失、損毀、塗污或被竊，主辦及售票機構概不補發或更換門票，亦不會承擔任何責任，敬請小心保管。

*Tickets purchased from FANTOPIA are e -tickets, paper tickets redemption is not available.

FANTOPIA 所購之門票為電子票, 不提供更換實體門票服務

*This event uses dynamic electronic tickets. You must log in to your Fantopia account and show the electronic ticket QR code when entering. Paper printouts or screenshots of the electronic ticket QR code will not be accepted for entry.

本次活動採用動態電子門票，入場時需登入 Fantopia 帳戶並出示電子門票二維碼。紙質打印或截圖的電子門票二維碼將無法入場

*We do not offer returns or exchanges

售出門票不設退換

eventsEntity.entityAdress: RM 413,4/F LUCKY CTR 165-171WAN CHAI RD WAN CHAI HK
